text: Håkan Westin (born 21 July 1964 in Ed Parish, Sweden) is a Swedish former cross-country skier. He won Vasaloppet in the years of 1993 and 1996. He is also, 15 generations backwards in time, ancestor of Gustav Vasa. Håkan Westin is the brother of another Swedish cross-country skier, Marie-Helene Östlund.Horisont 1996, page 58 - Westin tog andra Vasaloppet, Bertmarks 1997 == References == ==Other websites== *Håkan Westin *Westin Adventure Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish skiers
title: Håkan Westin
